title: Firm hires 90 workers from labor market graph

content.question:
The graph above shows the marginal revenue product (MRP) and the market wage rate for

a profit-maximizing firm. Which of the following is true of the firmâ€™s hiring of labor?

choices.label: It should hire between 15 and 40 workers.
It should hire between 40 and 90 workers.

topic.text: 5.3: Profit-Maximizing Behavior in Perfectly Competitive Factor Markets

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
